metadata.Title: CVE-2017-7520 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description:
OpenVPN versions before 2.4.3 and before 2.3.17 are vulnerable todenial-of-service and/or possibly sensitive memory leak triggered byman-in-the-middle attacker.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-7520` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

openvpn - 2.3.10-1ubuntu2.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: openvpn package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.3.10-1ubuntu2.1').
